# [FEAT] Live Chat Widget

## Labels
`omnichannel`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement a live chat widget for real-time customer support on websites.

## Requirements

### Chat Widget
- Embeddable JavaScript widget
- Customizable appearance (colors, position)
- Mobile responsive design
- Launcher button customization
- Pre-chat form
- Offline message form

### Chat Features
- Real-time messaging
- Typing indicators
- Read receipts
- File/image sharing
- Emoji support
- Chat history
- Proactive chat triggers

### Agent Interface
- Chat queue management
- Concurrent chat limit
- Chat transfer to other agents
- Chat-to-ticket conversion
- Canned responses
- Visitor information panel

### Chat Routing
- Skills-based routing
- Department/group routing
- Round-robin distribution
- Agent availability status
- Queue position display

### Chat Management
- Operating hours
- Offline behavior
- Chat transcripts
- Chat ratings
- Analytics dashboard

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk offers messaging and live chat across web, mobile, and social media channels for real-time support.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Widget embeds correctly
- [ ] Real-time messaging works
- [ ] File sharing supported
- [ ] Chat routing functional
- [ ] Transcripts saved
- [ ] Chat analytics available
